Barbara Stone Memorial Scholarship
Scholarship Application Information

Award:
The Borrego Springs Education Association is offering two (2) $500 scholarships with a chance for reapplication to one graduating senior from Borrego Springs High School who has been accepted at any accredited post-secondary school.

Eligibility Criteria
1. An overall GPA of at least 3.0
2. Good citizenship
3. School and community service
4. Career interests

Application procedures:
Interested high school seniors should complete the attached application form and return it to the high school office by May 31st, 2020

Each graduate of BSHS has the opportunity to apply each year of post secondary education for up to four years upon receipt of verification that the student has maintained:

1. Appropriate GPA towards graduation progress.
2. Minimum of 12 semester units per semester or the equivalent.
3. Satisfactory progress toward graduation or completion of degree.

Lead by two junior class members focused on making the world a cleaner and healthier place, they want to start doing that within their school and community.
